TEXT: The applicant , Mr PERSON , is of NORP origin living in GPE , GPE . He is represented before the ORG by Mr A. GPE , a lawyer practising in GPE , GPE . ORG ( “ the Government ” ) were represented by the delegates of their Agent , Mr PERSON , Adviser at ORG and PERSON , Legal Assistant at ORG . ORG did not make use of their right to intervene ( Article CARDINAL § CARDINAL of the Convention ) .
The facts of the case , as submitted by the parties , may be summarised as follows .

The applicant is the owner of CARDINAL plots of land situated in PERSON in the municipality of GPE , which cover a total of CARDINAL hectares . In DATE this land , which was used for agricultural purposes , was occupied by NORP KFOR ( ORG - led peacekeeping forces ) soldiers and became the main national base in GPE for the NORP ORG contingent . Since then the applicant was denied access to and use of his land .
